byline.original: By JAMES MacDONALD Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: SOUTHAMPTON, England, Dec. 2--In the night raids of Saturday and Sunday this town suffered the severest kind of damage. Casualties for the two nights' raids are known to be about 370 killed and injured, according to an Air Ministry communique toda...

headline.main: SOUTHAMPTON HIT AS BY EARTHQUAKE; Writer Describes Shambles Caused by Raids--370 Casualties Listed REFUGEE PROBLEM HUGE Water Cut Off in Places, Food Distribution Is Difficult-- Courage Marks Populace

lead_paragraph: SOUTHAMPTON, England, Dec. 2--In the night raids of Saturday and Sunday this town suffered the severest kind of damage. Casualties for the two nights' raids are known to be about 370 killed and injured, according to an Air Ministry communique today.
